<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An analysis for type-inference for VPValues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It infers the scalar type for a given VPValue by bottom-up traversing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// through defining recipes until root nodes with known types are reached (e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// live-ins or load recipes). The types are then propagated top down through</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that the analysis caches the inferred types. A new analysis object must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be constructed once a VPlan has been modified in a way that invalidates any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the previously inferred types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vptypeanalysis"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vptypeanalysis/#a6f7db0dca8dba48f3a3b39f2d1d859a3">VPTypeAnalysis</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const VPValue &#42;, Type &#42;&gt;</a> CachedTypes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Type of the canonical induction variable. Used for all VPValues without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// any underlying IR value (like the vector trip count or the backedge-taken</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// count).</span></CodeLine>
